scripts.stop_mongo: ps aux | grep mongo | grep -v grep | awk {'print $2'} | xargs kill -9
scripts.stop_node: ps aux | grep node | grep -v grep | grep -v Atom | awk {'print $2'} | xargs kill -9
scripts.restart_everything: npm run stop_mongo && npm run stop_node && npm run start_mongo && npm run start_node
